name: HousingAdequacy
title: Housing Adequacy
description: Determination of whether the person is living in housing with severe physical problems (e.g., lack of running water or electricity, lack of key fixtures, like a bathtub or shower, exposed wiring, structural deficiencies). (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Housing Adequacy.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether the person is living in housing with severe physical problems (e.g., lack of running water or electricity, lack of key fixtures, like a bathtub or shower, exposed wiring, structural deficiencies)..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Housing Adequacy.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Housing Adequacy.)

contains.display: Home environment safety and stability - visual analog rating [ePCAM]
